Configure Entity Type
Pre-conditions: 
  -These are key properties of the entity type
Main Success Scenario:
  1. Set uri
  2. Set label
  3. Set dataLabelPattern
  4. Set secondaryLabelPattern
  5. Set abstract
  6. Set typeColor
  7. Set typeIcon
  8. Set typeImage
  9. "Set Attributes"
  
Set Attributes
Note:
  -This is the "attributes" name in JSON 
Main Success Scenario:
  1. Set label
  2. Set name
  3. Set description
  4. Set type
  5. Set hidden
  6. Set important
  7. Set system
  8. Set faceted
  9. Set searchable
  10. Set attributeOrdering
  11. Set uri
  12. Set skipInDataAccess
